pupusas.description: Filled with chicharron, beans and cheese.

pupusas.description: Filled with shrimp cooked with tomatoes, onions and spices. (With or without cheese)

pupusas.name: Veggie
pupusas.description: Filled with a mix of zucchini, yellow squash, carrots, onions, spinach and cheese.

pupusas.name: Vegan
pupusas.description: Filled with zucchini, yellow squash, carrots, onions and spinach.

pupusas.name: Loroco
pupusas.description: Central American native vining flowers mix with cheese.

pupusas.description: Filled with spicy jalapeno peppers with cheese.

pupusas.name: Queso

other_salv_dishes.name: Yuca Con Chicharron
other_salv_dishes.description: Chunks of fried pork served over yuca frita, curtido and our signature yuca sauce.

other_salv_dishes.name: Carne Guisada
other_salv_dishes.description: Salvadoran style stewed beef and vegetables served with rice, salad and 2 tortillas.

other_salv_dishes.name: Pollo Guisada
other_salv_dishes.description: Salvadoran style stewed chicken and vegetables served with rice, salad and 2 tortillas.

other_salv_dishes.name: Tamale
other_salv_dishes.description: A steamed pocket of specially prepared corn masa filled with chicken and potatoes wrapped in a plantain leaf served with curtido and salsa.

other_salv_dishes.name: Pasteles
other_salv_dishes.description: Three corn flour turnovers filled with picado de carne (ground beef and vegetables), chicken or veggies served over lettuce salad and sauce.

other_salv_dishes.name: Salvadoran Enchiladas
other_salv_dishes.description: Three handmade crisped fried tortillas topped with picado de carne, chicken or veggies, fresh salad, avocado, hardboiled egg and shredded queso duro.

house_drinks.name: Horchata de Morro
house_drinks.description: Traditional Salvadoran drink with ground morro seeds, rice and milk

house_drinks.name: Ensalada
house_drinks.description: Mango and pineapple fresco w/ diced fruit

soups.name: Veggie Tortilla Soup
soups.description: Delicious creamy soup made with shredded vegetables topped with tortilla strips, cheese and cilantro.

desserts.name: Tres Leches
desserts.description: Authentic Central America delicious moist three milk cake.
